title: Citibank Peru Inaugurates Jockey Plaza Smart Branch
summary: Lima - Citibank Peru has inaugurated a new smart branch in Jockey Plaza and renovated its branches in Chocavento and Benavides to make them "smart" as well. The new branch model offers clients a unique experience, thanks to innovations in atmosphere and design, technological solutions, customer service and, above all, digital communications.
tag-1: Citibank Peru Inaugurates Jockey Plaza Smart Branch
tag-3: Lima – Citibank Peru has inaugurated a new smart branch in Jockey Plaza and renovated its branches in Chocavento and Benavides to make them "smart" as well. The new branch model offers clients a unique experience, thanks to innovations in atmosphere and design, technological solutions, customer service and, above all, digital communications.
tag-4: Branches developed under the "smart" concept are part of a technology and innovation strategy to bring the bank closer to its clients and simplify communications. "This concept strengthens Citibank's commitment to offering improved client interaction with the bank's products and services via cutting-edge digital solutions and highly trained personnel," explained Marlon Ramos, Vice President for Retail Banking.
tag-5: The "smart" experience begins as soon as clients enter the Chocavento, Benavides and Jockey branches, where they can access information about benefits, products and fees via touch screen. The "smart" concept is complemented by the Citibank Online platform, which allows clients to carry out transactions in a secure environment supported by Citibank. In addition, the Citibank smartphone app offers the ability to make credit card payments, transfer money between Citibank accounts, conduct interbank transfers and access the Citi Benefits platform.
tag-6: The app also features geolocalization services especially designed for Android, Apple and Blackberry users that are available for free download from Google Play, the App Store and the Blackberry Store, thereby combining augmented reality functions, mapping, alerts and social network links.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
